channel.title: How to make ::master for everyone

item.title: How to make ::master for everyone
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

By placing the master command under the playersCommand void in commands class.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("You can't do that while wearing items!"); return; } }
